reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: All costs associated with the medical support of volunteers in Gambia, The. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: The Gambia is a moderate majority-Muslim country that contributes troops to ongoing African Union and United Nations peacekeeping operations across Africa. U.S. foreign assistance to the Gambia promotes professionalization and good leadership within the Gambian Armed Forces.

All headquarters and overseas costs associated with the medical support of Volunteers. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.
